p: Lemon verbena was obtained from local market (Sari, Iran). All chemicals and solvents were provided from Sigma‐Aldrich (St. Louis, MO) and Merck (Darmstadt, Germany) companies. DPPH (2,2‐diphenyl‐1‐picrylhydrazyl) and β‐carotene were purchased from Sigma‐Aldrich. BHT used as standard antioxidant provided from TITRAN.
